email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Milwaukee
email_response.body:
Hi there!

This looks like a great project. I'd love to be considered.

I have a bucket truck (2020 Ford F-550 with Versalift aerial) and a fiber splicer for any related work. I'm BICSI certified and OSHA-10 trained.

I'm based in Milwaukee and willing to travel throughout Wisconsin.

When would the project start? I have availability next week.

Thanks!
Emily White
Lakefront Services
(262) 555-0654
